cards.text: What's a small thing that made you smile recently?
If you could instantly become an expert in something, what would it be?
What's the most embarrassing song you love to sing in the shower?
Do your best impression of another player for 30 seconds
Text your crush "I love pineapple on pizza" right now
Speak in an accent of your choice until your next turn
Call your mom and tell her you've joined a circus
What's the weirdest dream you've ever had?
If you could trade lives with anyone in the room for a day, who would it be?
Do your best chicken dance impression
What's your most irrational fear?
Take {n} sips while standing on one leg
What's the worst fashion choice you've ever made?
Send your last selfie to a random contact
What's the most ridiculous lie you've ever told?
Wear your clothes backwards for the next 3 rounds
What's your most embarrassing childhood nickname?
Take {n} sips while doing your best robot dance
What's the worst advice you've ever given?
Let another player post anything they want on your social media
What is the silliest thing you have ever done to get someone’s attention?
Try to lick your elbow. If you fail, take {n} sips.
Have you ever been caught singing in the shower?
Act like a monkey for 1 minute.
What is the weirdest thing you do when you are alone?
Dance without music for 2 minutes.
What is the most childish thing you still do?
Tell a joke. If no one laughs, take {n} sips.
What is the strangest thing in your refrigerator right now?
If animals could talk, which would be the rudest?
Try to make a tower of objects using only one hand. If it falls, take {n} sips.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever searched for online?
Sing a song using only animal sounds.
What’s the weirdest food combination you enjoy?
Do 20 push-ups or {n} sips.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever bought?
Imitate a celebrity of the group’s choice.
What’s the worst date you’ve ever been on?
Speak only in rhymes for the next 5 minutes. If you fail, take {n} sips.
What’s the most embarrassing thing in your room right now?
Try to juggle three items you find nearby. If you drop them, take {n} sips.
What’s the silliest mistake you’ve ever made at work or school?
Do a dramatic reading of a children’s book.
What’s the most childish prank you’ve ever pulled?
Balance a spoon on your nose for 1 minute. If it falls, take {n} sips.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever worn?
Try to moonwalk.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever eaten on a dare?
Tell everyone an embarrassing story about yourself.
What’s the most awkward situation you’ve ever been in?
Act like a cat for the next 2 minutes.
What’s the most embarrassing thing your parents have caught you doing?
Try to do a handstand (even if you fail).
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever collected?
Make up a song about someone in the room.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever said to a stranger?
Do your best impression of a commercial.
What’s the most ridiculous rumor you’ve heard about yourself?
Try to whistle with your mouth closed. If you cant, take {n} sips.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen someone do in public?
Dance to the next song that plays, no matter what it is.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever tripped over?
Try to lick your nose. If you fail, take {n} sips.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever found on the street?
Tell a story using only gestures.
What’s the most embarrassing text you’ve ever sent to the wrong person?
Try to spin around in a circle 10 times and then walk straight. If you can't walk straight, take {n} sips.
What’s the weirdest thing you do to procrastinate?
Sing the alphabet backwards.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever said on a date?
Try to do a magic trick.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever worn to a party?
Make up a rap about someone in the room.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever argued about?
Do your best impression of a toddler throwing a tantrum.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever done in front of a crowd?
Try to hula hoop. If you fail, take {n} sips.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen at a wedding?
Tell a story using only movie titles.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to avoid work?
Do your best robot impression.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever said to a teacher?
Try to do a cartwheel.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen on public transportation?
Make up a commercial for a household item.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to impress someone?
Do your best impression of a famous painting.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever done at a sporting event?
Try to juggle three oranges. If you drop them, take {n} sips.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen at a concert?
Tell a story using only song lyrics.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to get out of a speeding ticket?
Do your best impression of a mime.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever said during a presentation?
Try to say the alphabet backwards in under 20 seconds.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen at a funeral?
Make up a poem about someone in the room.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to win a bet?
Serenade a stranger with a song of your choice.
What is the most embarrassing thing you have ever worn to a formal event?
Try to do a magic trick using only office supplies.
What is the silliest thing you’ve ever said on a date?
Do your best impression of a sea creature.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever done in front of your boss?
Act like a robot vacuum cleaner for one minute.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to avoid a phone call?
Try to make a sculpture out of food.
What’s the silliest thing you’ve ever done to get out of a speeding ticket?
Do your best impression of a toddler throwing a tantrum.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever said during a public speech?
Try to do the worm.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to try and impress a crush?
Act like a news reporter and interview someone in the room.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen at a party?
Try to make a sandwich using only your feet.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever done while drunk?
Do your best impression of a grandma.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to avoid doing chores?
Try to do a handstand against a wall.
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen on a first date?
Make up a song about the person to your left.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever said to a telemarketer?
Do your best impression of a cat stuck in a tree.
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever done to try and get a free upgrade?
Try to juggle three marshmallows.
If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?
Lick the bottom of your shoe or take {n} sips
Eat a spoonful of mustard or take {n} sips
Empty your pockets and let the group decide what to do with the contents or take {n} sips
Give a foot massage to the person on your left or take {n} sips
Let the person to your right draw on your face with lipstick or take {n} sips
